review: Great way to watch TV. If your a prime member it's a waste not to have. No shortage of things to watch.

review: Didn't like it. Very few options to watch free movies for Amazon prime members.

review: So far it works great. I watch HBO Go and Netflix no problem.

review: Works great. Has everything I need.

review: compact, portable and effective. great for travelling, unbeatable once coupled to amazon prime.

review: Great invention....we even took it to the hotel! Can't believe we waited so long to purchase.  Very easy to use.

review: Love, so easy to use any where!

review: Still under review but working great so. The intent was to ditch cable TV but have not been because not much live streaming if any. I'm yet to explore that.
